description.english: Play 1 match.
Play 10 matches.
Play 100 matches.
Win 1 match.
Win 10 matches.
Win 100 matches.
Secure 1 biocore. Anyone on your team can initiate it.
Secure 10 biocores. Anyone on your team can initiate them.
Secure 100 biocores. Anyone on your team can initiate them.
Secure 500 biocores. Anyone on your team can initiate them.
Secure 3 biocores two matches in a row. These matches must be against players. Anyone on your team can initiate them.
Secure 3 biocores in a match against players without anyone on your team dying. Anyone on your team can initiate them.
Respawn 3 times in the same match.
Secure a biocore that your team didn't initially capture. Must be done in a match against players. Anyone on your team can initiate it.
Sustain 500 damage in the same match.
Have a biocore in the process of securing when the match times out. Must be done in a match against players.
Kill or assist in killing 1 enemy player in a match.
Kill or assist in killing 100 enemy players in matches.
Kill or assist in killing 1,000 enemy players in matches.
Kill or assist in killing 10 enemy players in the same match without dying. Must be done in a match against players.
Down an enemy player who is in the process of performing an ability.
Down an enemy player within 3 seconds of them getting revived.
Revive 1 downed team mate.
Revive 100 downed team mates.
Restore 1,000 health or shield to team mates in matches.
Restore 10,000 health or shield to team mates in matches.
Steal a biocore from an enemy extractor.

displayName.english: If I Can't Have it, No One Can

description.english: Steal a biocore from an enemy extractor with less than 10 seconds remaining of the match. Must be done in a match against players.
Repair your base after it has been sabotaged.
Use a consumable to kill or assist in killing 1 enemy player in a match.
Use a consumable to kill or assist in killing 100 enemy players in matches.
Sabotage an enemy base using a hacking device.
Down or kill 2 or more enemy players using the same frag or HE grenade. Cannot be achieved against bots.
Use 25 med kits or shield repairers in the same match.
Resist a spore or fire effect thanks to a rejuvenation fruit.
Revive yourself with a resurrector.
Unlock a shield from a shop.
Unlock a weapon from a shop.
Supply power towards a team upgrade.
Supply 10,000 power towards a team upgrade.
Down or kill an enemy player using the air strike event. Cannot be done against bots.
Down or kill an enemy player using the toxic gas event. Cannot be done against bots.
Close the blast doors.
Obtain 500 power from the reactor power generator in the same game.
Claim an Upgrade Uplink for your team.
Claim a Shop Uplink for your team.
Control an Upgrade Uplink and Shop Uplink at the same time.
Disable 4 different enemy players' shields using the same EMP device.
Use the resurrection point to bring back a fallen team mate.
Collect a weapon of at least 1,500 power using a weapon replicator.
Unlock a loot container.
Unlock 100 loot containers.
Pick 100 plants.
Gain access to a keycard vault.
Find an action figure in the lobby.
Find all 6 action figures in the lobby.
Set a time in 3 different parkour time trials in the lobby.
Reach level 100.
Get reputation 3 with 8 shade factions or individuals.
Get reputation 5 with a shade faction or individual.
Get reputation 5 with 8 shade factions or individuals.
Own 40 battle rifle modules.
Own 40 shotgun modules.
Own 40 beam glove modules.
Own 40 sniper rifle modules.
Own 40 plasma rifle modules.
Own 40 perks.
Find a mystery item.
Find 50 mystery items.
Complete 100 story missions.
Have one of your custom guns copied by another player during a match.
Use a melee attack to down an enemy player. Cannot be done against bots.
Kill or assist in killing a burrower.
Kill or assist in killing 50 burrowers.
Kill a green, blue, and black cattermaw in the same match.
Secure 2 biocores in the same match against players. Anyone on your team can initiate them.
Secure 3 biocores in the same match against players. Anyone on your team can initiate them.
Achieve a biocore streak of 10. The biocore streak is only affected by matches against players.
Achieve a biocore streak of 25. The biocore streak is only affected by matches against players.
